text: All this wine nonsense! You get all these wine people, don't you? Wine this, wine that. Let's have a bit of red, let's have a bit of white. Ooh, that's a snazzy bouquet. Oh, this smells of, I don't know, basil. Sometimes you just want to say, sod all this wine, just give me a pint of, ______
And now a new regular segment of my show______
I'm Allan Partridge, Join me tonight when my guest will be ______
No, not my face. I'm doing a photo-shoot tomorrow for ______
what do you think of the pedestrianisation of Norwich city centre?
